original_title: WIDAC celebrates 5 years of successful partnering with world’s largest manufacturer of office furniture Steelcase
original_body_lines: WIDAC recently celebrated 5th anniversary of a successful partnership with the world’s largest manufacturer of office furniture Steelcase.
To mark the milestone WIDAC together with Steelcase, organised a CSR project to Voice for Voiceless (website: www.vforv.org) with a presentation of wheelchairs, prostatic legs and dry rations.

WIDAC, incorporated in 1988 and on its efficacious journey of 35 years has formed partnerships with many global brands to create an ambiance with a hint of luxurious elegance, grace and style as well as providing award winning turnkey interior design solutions (www.widacinteriors.com).

Steelcase Inc. is an American manufacturer of furniture, case goods, seating, storage and partitioning systems for offices as well as health care and educational institutions is now on its 111th year expanding over 750 dealers across the world.

Steelcase is a global design and thought leader in the world of work, manufacturing innovative solutions to help people work in a comfortable ergonomic environment. Their seating solutions promote ‘Six Dimensions’ of wellbeing to achieve the best posture while working.

WIDAC with their global partner Steelcase, has successfully completed many significant projects in Sri Lanka in the areas of international banking and financial institutions, global it firms, multinationals, foreign missions and the telecommunication industry as well as the product has been a bestseller for the home office concept.
